name: Coda Octopus Group, Inc.
description: Coda Octopus Group, Inc. is a technology company that specializes in underwater and marine engineering solutions. Founded in 1994, the company is headquartered in New York City, USA, and operates globally, providing innovative products and services for the defense and commercial sectors. Coda Octopus is particularly known for its advanced sonar systems and underwater robotics, which are used for a variety of applications including maritime security, oceanographic research, and underwater construction. Its flagship products include the CodaOctopus Echoscope® and the CodaOctopus 3D sonar systems, which offer real-time imaging capabilities and are invaluable in complex underwater environments. The company's technology plays a crucial role in improving safety and efficiency in underwater operations, catering to customers such as government agencies, defense contractors, and marine engineering firms. Coda Octopus is committed to research and development, continuously enhancing its offerings to meet the evolving needs of its clients. The company also focuses on building strong partnerships within the marine industry to foster innovation and drive growth. With a vision of becoming a leader in underwater technology, Coda Octopus aims to revolutionize how underwater tasks are executed, ensuring precision and effectiveness.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
